entry.title: New release for MediaCMS: v5.0.0
entry.content:
Features

  • Introduces RBAC capabilities - https://github.com/mediacms-io/mediacms/pull/1243
  • Introduces SAML support with the ability to add custom attributes that will allow user to be associated with groups - https://github.com/mediacms-io/mediacms/pull/1243
  • Introduces an Identity Provider apps for better organizing different options in the admin. This gives the ability to provide a mapping based on attributes from the identity provider response, such as groups in MediaCMS, or roles. This also introduces a new login form and urls that can be specified. - https://github.com/mediacms-io/mediacms/pull/1243
  • Adds jazzmin theme (https://django-jazzmin.readthedocs.io/) for Django admin - https://github.com/mediacms-io/mediacms/pull/1243
  • Performs reordering in admin fields, mostly through seperate app admin_customizations - https://github.com/mediacms-io/mediacms/pull/1243

This work is being sponsored by DeiC | Danish e-Infrastructure Consortium

entry.title: New release for MediaCMS: v6.0.0: Basic video editor
entry.content:
This work is being sponsored by DeiC | Danish e-Infrastructure Consortium

Features

  • video trimmer support with advanced capabilities that can replace video, save as new or create segments
  • rounded corners are configurable, by default USE_ROUNDED_CORNERS = True but can be set to False
  • edit media page is broken to two parts: metadata and publish
  • publish media page now shows as read only the fields that cannot be modified due to permissions
  • attempt to show the original video, in case video is processing. Thus user can immediately see what they have uploaded, change metadata or even trim it. Before it would show a blank video player and a message video is processing

Fixes

  • edits getting lost - https://github.com/mediacms-io/mediacms/issues/1104
